text: Marcelo Martinessi is a Paraguayan filmmaker. His films include "Karai norte" (2009), "The Lost Voice" (2016), and The Heiresses (), the latter being selected to compete for the Golden Bear at the 68th Berlin International Film Festival. ==Filmography== * Los paraguayos (2007, documentary) * Paraguay según Agustín Barrios (2007, documentary) * Partida (2008, short film) * Karai Norte (2009, short film) * Calle Última (2011, short film) * El baldío (2012, short film) * Diario Guaraní (2016, documentary) * La voz perdida (2017, short film) * Las herederas (2018, feature film) ==Awards== {| class="wikitable" |- !
